abstract: Lee Saunders, president of 1.6-million-member union American Federation of State, County and Municipal Employees, is becoming increasingly important Washington power broker; is pushing for progressive goals even as unions face relentless pressure from conservative activists and politicians.
lead_paragraph: Lee Saunders, president of the biggest unions in the United States, has become an increasingly important voice in Washington. But that may no longer have the same currency it once did.

headline.main: A Power Broker Who Wants Labor at the Table, Not on the Menu

snippet: Lee Saunders, president of the biggest unions in the United States, has become an increasingly important voice in Washington. But that may no longer have the same currency it once did....
